name: Rose
description: The classic symbol of love and passion; originated in ancient Persia.

name: Daisy
description: Symbolizes innocence and purity; their name comes from 'day's eye'.

name: Lotus
description: Represents spiritual enlightenment and rebirth; grows beautifully in murky water.

name: Camellia
description: Symbolizes adoration and perfection; highly valued in East Asian cultures.

name: Marigold
description: Known as the 'herb of the sun'; represents power, strength, and light.

name: Orchid
description: A symbol of exotic beauty and luxury; one of the largest plant families.

name: Peony
description: Represents bashfulness and a happy marriage; often called the 'King of Flowers'.

name: Poppy
description: Symbolizes remembrance and peace; known for their vibrant, paper-thin petals.

name: Sunflower
description: Symbolizes loyalty and longevity; famous for following the sun across the sky.

name: Tulip
description: Represents perfect and deep love; famously associated with the Netherlands.

name: Zinnia
description: Symbolizes endurance and daily remembrance; very popular in butterfly gardens.

name: Lavender
description: Known for its calming scent; represents serenity, grace, and devotion.
